Description:
A BEAUTIFULLY KEPT HOME WITH A HUGE BUNGALOW IN A COURT LIKE POSITION!
RANGEBANK ESTATE, CRANBOURNE (125658670): Nestled in a secure location, this home offers plenty of privacy for a young family along with the flexibility that comes with a large separate bungalow - this bonus space is ideal for those requiring a 2nd living zone, children's retreat, man cave, home office or even as a living quarters for the in-laws. The list of possibilities is endless!
12 Toirram Crescent has been in the same caring hands for close to 14 years and presents in beautiful condition with a handful of significant upgrades only adding to its comfort and appeal. Behind the pleasing brick facade you will find a generous lounge room with slate floors that also grace the adjoining meals area and the fully equipped, updated hostess kitchen.
There are 3 bedrooms that all feature built in wardrobes as well as a renovated family bathroom and the bonus of 2 toilets. Extras such as ducted heating and evaporative cooling are welcome additions, whilst outside you will be greeted by a double garage set behind lockable gates plus a private yard and a huge covered patio that is perfect for entertaining. With a generous block measuring app. 652m2 you will never be short on space!
The bungalow itself features a generous living area, an adjoining office/bedroom plus another zone that could easily be converted into a bathroom or powder room if required.
If you believe in the age old theory that a top location equals great real estate then this is an absolute must to inspect! Sensational position within walking distance to Rangebank Primary School and Kindergarten with Lawson Pool Recreation Reserve literally down the road. Close proximity to buses, Merinda Park train station and Thompson Road, which provides direct access to all of the shopping facilities on offer at the Cranbourne Home Maker Centre!
With turnover in this popular estate at an all-time low don't muck around or else you will miss out!
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW (PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS)!
Our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with fair terms and conditions.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
4 BEDS ON 679SQM CLOSE TO STATION!
Act quickly to secure this great 4 bedroom home suiting investors, home buyers & renovators. Set on a huge 679sqm opposite a primary school and only moments walk to shops, train station, doctors, childcare & more, this home features robes to all four bedrooms, spacious lounge, gas heating & coonara, air con, kitchen with gas cooking & dishwasher, paved pergola, rear access from the double carport into the double garage, with extra shedding & storage in the large yard. Added extra of potential to develop (STCA). With everything close by, you won't need a car in this prime location of central Cranbourne. This property won't last long, contact Daniel today!

Description:
Perfect for First Home Buyers & Investors!
(217243) This home is situated in a quiet street close to schools, parks, shops, and only a short walk to the local train station, making it the ideal location for first home buyers and investors in particular.
Listed below are just some of the features this great property has to offer;
- Quality built 3 bedroom brick veneer family home.
- Master with full ensuite & WIR.
- Bedrooms 2 & 3 with BIR's.
- Family room, separate dining & rumpus room.
- Good size outdoor entertaining area.
- Large workshop with concrete floor and electricity.
With genuine sellers and situated in such a central location, homes like this one do not last long.
So be quick and arrange your private viewing today!
For all enquiries & inspections please Call Jason Brown Direct.
Jason Brown : 0423 768 424

Description:
SMART INVESTMENT CLOSE TO STATION
Set on a corner block of 581sqm close to everything, here is your opportunity for a great buy. Investors & those handy with tools will love the potential of this property within walking distance to the station. Featuring 3 bedrooms with ensuite to master, kitchen with gas cooking, enclosed rumpus room, family bathroom with spa bath, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar panels, established garden and full fencing. Separate side access to a 4 car garage and double carport means lots of off street parking, and the option to develop (STCA) means this home has the power to perform well in the future. Vendor requires to lease the property back for 12-18 months. Contact Daniel for further information!

Centrally located renovated gem on big land
Convenience of a renovated home centrally located with a large block gives you all the reason to come and have a look at this property. Offering spacious and plenty of light filled living areas the property has ample space for a young family or even a young couple starting out their journey.
- Situated on 612 Sqm block of land
- Fully renovated brand new Kitchen and bathroom.
- Open floor plan with multiple living areas.
- Open fire place lock up garage and split system.
Located in the heart of Cranbourne you will be in close proximity to the Camms Road Shopping strip, public transport and local primary and secondary schools. If you would like to inspect the house please call Daniel or Marvick.

Description:
Perfect location with no body corporate
The perfect position is everything when it’s comes to real estate, whether you are looking for your first home or as an investment. This unit is just that. Close proximity to all amenities, including Cranbourne Park & Hunt Club Shopping Centers, Casey Grammar school, medical Centre, and quick access to Narre Warren Cranbourne Rd & South Gippsland Highway. Furthermore, this unit provides you with the best situation of not having to pay for Owners Corporation (Body Corporate).
This beautifully maintained 2 bedroom unit is currently being renting out with a lease expiring end of August. On offer with the following features and benefits:
- Modern & immaculate kitchen with full bench space & cupboards
- Quality floating floor & carpet in both bedrooms
- Spacious lounge overlooking private courtyard & side access
- Under cover single carport allowing total access to the front door
Please don’t miss our open for inspections and see for yourself. This proposition should not be missed.

Description:
Investors dream
Sitting on a corner block this spacious four bedroom home is close to schools, local shopping centre and a short drive to train station. Close to all amenities and situated in a great area providing privacy and recreational park across the road for the family. This home is sure to keep you comfortable all year round with heating and cooling. The master bedroom has a walk in robe and en suite and all other bedrooms with built in robes. A formal lounge area and a second family open plan living room and meals area. With a lovely modern, light filled kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher. All rooms carpeted room and tiled wet areas. Externally you will find a good sized double lock up garage. The backyard can be maintained with ease.
For further information please contact our office on 03 5991 1800.
This is a great investment property and is currently periodically tenanted with options to extend the lease.
PLEASE CONTACT AGENT TO ARRANGE AN INSPECTION TIME

Description:
Designed For Family Living, Inside and Out - 4 Bedrooms
In Brookland Greens Estate surrounded by other lovely homes on a 606m2 block, this modern, 12 year-old beautifully presented 4 bedroom family home is nicely designed with 2 living areas and a large outdoor living area.
The home is spacious throughout and features a huge formal lounge/dining room, an open and roomy family room that leads out onto the large outdoor pergola, ideal for bbqâ??s and the kids to play. The modern chefâ??s quarters offers stainless steel appliances that include a 900mm oven, range-hood and a dishwasher.
All four bedrooms are double with quality plush carpets, 3 are with robes and the other at the front could also be used as a large study with the master offering a full ensuite.
Letâ??s not forget the ducted heating and cooling, high ceilings throughout, theatre projector, NBN connection, quality fittings with neutral toning, remote double garage with internal and rear access, big private backyard with a cubbyhouse and an additional double garage for the boys man cave and the list goes on.
All of this is in close proximity to Parks, Coles, take away food shops, Public transport, Childcare and Schools.
A fantastic family home not to be missed, come see for yourself.

- Three good sized robed bedrooms
- Large formal lounge room
- Updated kitchen with plenty of bench space

All this value makes it the perfect home, ready for you to move in and enjoy or the ideal inclusion into your property portfolio. For more information on this outstanding property, Call Paul.

Description:
BACK ON THE MARKET!!
Potential just waiting to be unlocked, 6 Bedrooms in Central Cranbourne Just 7 Years Young on 655m2 Land!
Located in the ever popular suburb of Cranbourne, this classic brick home is packed with huge renovation potential, and would suit both investors and large families alike.
In need of a little TLC and some elbow grease, this property presents as a great opportunity. The home consists of 6 bedrooms, master with walk in robe and a full ensuite. Bedrooms 2,3,4 & 5 are all fitted with built in robes, plus the versatile extra to use the sixth room as either another bedroom or study.
In addition you will find a Central family bathroom with separate toilet, 2 well sized living areas, a well-equipped kitchen needing replacement appliances and ample bench space which overlooks the meals area. This house is also fitted with white tiled flooring and brand new carpet throughout.
Other features include gas ducted heating, a fully fenced grassed back yard and secure double lock up garage.
With a location just minutes from all amenities including the newly renovated Cranbourne Centro Shopping Centre, Cranbourne train station, bus stops, a range of restaurants and locals schools, you could not ask for much more.
This home screams potential and with just a little love and care the opportunities are endless!

Description:
One For The Astute Buyer
This comfortable residence on a prized corner allotment, is just the place for those looking for their first home, a low maintenance downsizer or a great addition to their investment portfolio. Set amongst established gardens, it offers a floorplan that is well designed for practical living.
A generous living room is light filled and flows through to an open plan zone with an ample kitchen and an adjoining dining room. This overlooks an undercover alfresco which is a perfect entertaining area, or a safe place for children to play whilst protected from the elements.
The home is completed by three robed bedrooms and a central bathroom that acts as a semi ensuite to the master. It is kept comfortable all year round by gas ducted heating and a split system heating/air-conditioning unit. A single garage and a single off-street parking place provide additional convenience.
You'll be pleased by the desirable amenities within close proximity, including a number of shopping precincts and schools, plus parks, reserves and open green spaces. Inspect now and avoid missing out on this great opportunity.

Description:
Spacious and Secure Low Maintenance Living
This spacious unit is the perfect example of low maintenance and carefree living. The location is simply superb, just walking distance to train station, public transport, shops and schools. The clever design, warm yet neutral tones and generous room sizes deliver a sensational family lifestyle that will appeal to first home owners and investors alike.
The cleverly designed floor plan includes spacious living and dining rooms that are flooded in natural light. A fully equipped kitchen sits opposite the meals area which opens out to the bbq area in backyard, perfect for entertaining throughout the year. Each of the bedrooms is robed.
Offering inclusions such as heating, air-conditioner and a single lock up garage with internal access, you are sure to be impressed.
This one won't last, arrange your inspection before it's too late.
Features
3 Bedrooms
Built-in Wardrobes
Heating/Aircon
Side Fenced Garden
Garden Shed

Description:
PEACE AND TRANQUILITY IN THE HEART OF CRANBOURNE
CRANBOURNE: A fantastic home in a central location, makes this property a very appealing proposition with unlimited potential! Set on a large block of 715m2 approx. nestled in a blue-chip location surrounded by all the town centre's local amenities
This cedar wood cottage style home consists of 2 great size bedrooms both with double robes, Open plan kitchen, dining & living area with high ceiling with exposed beams. Fantastic undercover outdoor entertaining area, the perfect place to entertain friends and family or to unwind and relax after a hard days work. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, secure carport, off road parking, large spacious back yard and so much more.
If you believe in the age-old theory that good real estate revolves around a central location, then you won't be disappointed!
The central area of Cranbourne is one of the most established and sought-after areas. With a mix of older homes on larger blocks and units. Located within a short distance to all facilities, including the newly renovated Cranbourne Park shopping complex, a range of restaurants, Cranbourne Secondary College and Cranbourne Train Station. Cranbourne Central provides the perfect combination for any resident.
BOOK AN INSPECTION TODAY, IT MAY BE GONE TOMORROW! - *PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with favourable conditions.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.

Description:
Ripe to Revamp or Redevelop
A great opportunity to secure your next investment in the heart of Cranbourneâ??s Activity Centre Zone. On offer is a well-loved existing dwelling with plenty of opportunity to add value through renovation or the exciting prospect of re-development with a massive 766m2 block (STCA)
Existing dwelling features include:
- Three good sized bedrooms all with ceiling fans- Master includes walk in robe and ensuite
- Flexible living space - two large living areas
- Generous kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, 900mm gas cooktop and plenty of cupboard space
- New gas ducted heating system throughout the home
- Original hardwood floorboards under current flooring
- Double lock up garage with enough parking at rear for a trailer or another car
Land Features include:
- Huge 766m2 block with small easement at rear of the property
- Activing Centre Zoning
- Central location - easily within walking distance to Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre, Cranbourne Secondary College, Public transport, Medical Facilities and much more
Donâ??t miss out on this fantastic opportunity, please do not hesitate to contact Simon Murphy or Mark Sewell as this one will not last!

Description:
Unbelievable Value!
WOW! This property will be snapped up fast - Having recently had a fresh makeover with new paintwork internally together with new carpets and blinds as well make this one property not only ready for you to move into but presenting incredible value for money! Some key features on offer include:
- Four bedrooms
- Full ensuite and walk-in robe to master
- Two separate living zones
- Tiled meals area
- Spacious kitchen
- New Dishwasher
- SS Appliance's
- Overhead cupboards
- Two Reverse cycle heating/cooling units
- Double lock up garage
- Internal access
- Remote control
- Rear roller door access
- Additional side access to back yard
- Low maintenance gardens
- Massive 600m2 of land
This is perfect for the owner occupier or savvy investor looking to establish themselves in this highly popular area with its ease of access to major shopping centres, schools and parklands make it a clear winner. Make sure you have this on your must inspect list of homes or you will miss out!
** Investors: Did you know Harcourts Narre Warren South are one of the largest rental management agencies in the South East? Our department head of rentals Melanie Keating has appraised this property at $380-$390p/w ($1,651-$1,695) for more details about leasing contact Melanie on 03 9705 3000 today.
